WorkshopItemInfo.Name: SolarInvicta
WorkshopItemInfo.Description:
!!! EVERY TIME THE MOD UPDATED YOU NEED TO DO AS THE INSTRUCTIONS BELOW !!! 每次MOD更新的时候都需要重复一遍下面的操作，游戏闪退了大概率是这个MOD的锅
Enable you to establish nations on other spacebodies with some special investment buffs and develop Antarctica and build habs on Earth!
